name: baas-sms-mcp
description: A Model Context Protocol server for SMS and MMS messaging services through BaaS API
author: mBaaS Team <jjunmo@mbaas.kr>

BAAS_API_KEY.description: Your BaaS API key for authentication

PROJECT_ID.description: Your project UUID from BaaS dashboard

tools.name: send_sms
tools.description: Send SMS message to one or multiple recipients for user authentication, notifications, or marketing campaigns

tools.name: send_mms
tools.description: Send MMS message with images to one or multiple recipients for rich media marketing and notifications

tools.name: get_message_status
tools.description: Get detailed message delivery status and analytics by group ID for monitoring and debugging

tools.name: get_send_history
tools.description: Get message sending history for a project with filtering options

examples.description: Send SMS verification code during user registration process

examples.prompt: Send MMS with order details and product image when order is placed
